data.title: Raheja The Delhi Mall, Kirti Nagar Delhi
data.meta_description: Raheja The Delhi Mall, Kirti Nagar Delhi: Explore Price List, Floor Plan, Payment Plan, Location Map, Reviews, Photos, and Videos. Download Project Brochure.
data.text:
Raheja The Delhi Mall is one of the most iconic projects of the Raheja Developers. This is the under construction commercial project located in Patel Nagar, Delhi. This commercial product is part of The Leela Sky Villas, which is Delhi's tallest building. Many to-level brands The Delhi Mall New Delhi provides unrivaled accommodation in the NCR, with shopping, movies, and stalls in Central Delhi. The Delhi Mall houses India's largest cinema.

The commercial Property for investment in Delhi has encircled wonderful amenities also, it is built as per the latest fire & safety norms. Raheja Delhi Mall spreads over 2.5 acres across. The realtor Developer which is located in central Delhi that offers a quality lifestyle yet unseen in Delhi/NCR where shopping binges, watching films, or food mindless snacking compulsions can all be catered to at the heart of Delhi.

RAHEJA THE DELHI MALL RERA NUMBER

About RERA: The Real Estate Regulations Act, or RERA, was introduced in 2016 to safeguard home buyer interests. RERA's main goal is to protect the buyers from fraud made by the builders.

Since the society is registered with the RERA online portal, it includes details of the project. Raheja the Delhi Mall RERA Registration number is DLRERA2018P0013.

SITE LAYOUT

A site Layout is also known as a 'site layout' it is a form of drawing used by architects, landscape architects, and engineers to represent the desired conditions for a specific area, usually a parcel of land that is to be altered.

If we talk about the Raheja the Delhi Mall layout, it spreads over 2.5 acres of area. In fact, it has 70% Green landscape and its remaining 30% will be used for Construction according to Sustainable Lifestyle Living.

FEATURES & AMENITIES

A property's Features and Amenities are the characteristics that promote its appeal to potential buyers or investors. The best commercial project to invest in Delhi are in detail like:

5 Level Car Parking available

Shopping Mall with International brands

Multiplex, Retail Shops, Food Court, Restaurants, and many more are available at the commercial project in Kirti Nagar, Delhi

Triple-Level underground basement.

Here, the Higher floors give high visibility to brands from the high traffic flyover on the Patel Road.

5 star Hotel at the Delhi Mall for various purposes.

Delhi's only commercial with multi level car parking for the visitors at the commercial shop in Delhi in Raheja Mall.

The adjacent green belt is visible from the showrooms and anchors.

9 Screen INOX Multiplex at the Delhi Mall Raheja.

All shops facing atrium(hall)

2 side open commercial plot to manage the crowd.

Luxurious and satisfying lifestyle is right here at Best commercial property in Delhi.

A well-known landmark Kirti Nagar (Delhi) -turns out to get the maximum footfall of the customers.

RAHEJA THE DELHI MALL LOCATION ADVANTAGE

The location is excellent for individuals and families too, who wish to invest in the commercial property for sale in Delhi. The project is strategically located for the people to have fun and experience lavish lifestyles at one point. Kirti Nagar is in close proximity to several schools, colleges, hospitals, recreation places, parks, entertainment centers, and all other facilities.

Current Status: Under Construction

Starting in April 2024 some of the tower's possessions will be provided. And the rest of the towers will be delivered by September 2024.
